alert.note: Alert for Finney; Hodgeman; Lane; Ness; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 9:16PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Finney, western Ness, northwestern Hodgeman, southwestern Trego and eastern Lane Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 915 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alamota, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Widespread heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Alamota around 920 PM CDT. Beeler around 930 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Arnold. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Kansas.
